How does it work?

You will have three diffrent stats

It will be very difficult for you to reach the apex ranks on one stat alone. In order to easier reach Apex rank you need to focus on all three stats. Strenght, Agility and Stamina

Rank up all your stats and level up

We have three diffrent exercises for all our stats that we consider crusial to excell in our guild. We are working on more exercies and more complicated algorithm but for now three is what we have.

If you reach high levels you will revice a rank.

We have ranks from E to S. When you reache a specific level you will rank up. When you have reached the apex ranks you will be able to compete against other!
